schema.title: Phenopacket schema
schema.description: An anonymous phenotypic description of an individual or biosample with potential genes of interest and/or diagnoses. The concept has multiple use-cases.

id.description: Unique, arbitrary, researcher-specified identifier for the phenopacket.
id.help: Unique, arbitrary, researcher-specified identifier for the phenopacket.

id.description: A unique researcher-specified identifier for an individual.
id.help: A unique researcher-specified identifier for an individual.

items.description: One of possibly many alternative identifiers for an individual.
items.help: One of possibly many alternative identifiers for an individual.

alternate_ids.description: A list of alternative identifiers for an individual.
alternate_ids.help: A list of alternative identifiers for an individual.

date_of_birth.description: A timestamp representing an individual's date of birth; either exactly or imprecisely.
date_of_birth.help: A timestamp representing an individual's date of birth; either exactly or imprecisely.

time_at_last_encounter.title: Time element schema

gestational_age.title: Gestational age schema

weeks.description: Completed weeks of gestation according to the above definition. REQUIRED.
weeks.help: Completed weeks of gestation according to the above definition. REQUIRED.

gestational_age.description: Gestational age (or menstrual age) is the time elapsed between the first day of the last normal menstrual period and the day of delivery.
gestational_age.help: Gestational age (or menstrual age) is the time elapsed between the first day of the last normal menstrual period and the day of delivery.
